text: 10.12 Sek 11.16-17, Apo 20.29 Bɨ wog mani nep gɨlɨg chag sipsip kod yenɨgab ak, bɨ chag sipsip mukep yɨpɨd gɨl mel agak. Chag sipsip nap nɨb mel ak nɨm, ne chen ladek olap nɨŋɨd, chag sipsip okok kɨlop kelɨgɨl pɨlɨk amnɨgab agak. Amenɨgab nɨm, chen ladek ne chag sipsip okok kɨlop yuk dam kɨd keke yokɨnɨgab agak.
